body:
Hi there.



I'm runing a DF analysis and HoneyBee is telling me that it's not able to white the file. I've set it to a custom location on Our office network:

 

I did change it back to the default working file  and it works perfectly

 

Is this a know issue

 

thank you all
topic: HoneyBee not writing analysis _workingfile through a network

replies.body: Hi Claudio, Do you have any white space in the file path?

Yeap I do have white spaces....I see now

 

thank ytou
How can I get the white spaces out of the file path?? So that HoneyBee can run properly.
Hi Charles. You just need to copy the file in a folder with no space. eg: c:\myWeatherFiles\sapleWeatherFile.epw
